job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In today's digital world, the place where technology and business come together is the platform. The Business & Platform Solutions Division (B&PS) works with its clients to enable them to make the best out of their digital transformation. We support clients in their migration from classical application to the digital world. The scale of the changes brought by digitalization across all industries is radically reshaping the way our customers consume technology and services. Our customers are shifting their priorities and budgets to support digital initiatives and implement business-driven technologies. B&PS is to be the partner of choice and trusted advisor of Atos clients to address these objectives.

   The team

   In this dynamic position within Eviden you have lots of freedom and responsibility as part of a young and growing team, a lead role is expected. You will work closely with a lot of tech and innovation enthusiasts on diverse data Architect projects, spanning different fields such as natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition. International travel can be an opportunity when willing.

   Within Atos there are many opportunities to further specialize yourself in the diverse field of Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture. Knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected.

   The role as a Data scientist

   As Data engineer/developer you will work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects to create insights that solve business problems in all industries and for all business functions.

   In the day to day activities you are facing clients with business demands to be translated into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, engineering frameworks, data analysis and recommendations. These activities will be executed in a multi-disciplinary agile team and will lead to implementation and production.

   Furthermore, we expect leadership capabilities to lead less experienced colleagues in their work.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer (DTC)

In today's digital world, the place where technology and business come together is the platform. The Business & Platform Solutions Division (B&PS) works with its clients to enable them to make the best out of their digital transformation. We support clients in their migration from classical application to the digital world. The scale of the changes brought by digitalization across all industries is radically reshaping the way our customers consume technology and services. Our customers are shifting their priorities and budgets to support digital initiatives and implement business-driven technologies. B&PS is to be the partner of choice and trusted advisor of Atos clients to address these objectives.

   The team

   In this dynamic position within Eviden you have lots of freedom and responsibility as part of a young and growing team, a lead role is expected. You will work closely with a lot of tech and innovation enthusiasts on diverse data Architect projects, spanning different fields such as natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition. International travel can be an opportunity when willing.

   Within Atos there are many opportunities to further specialize yourself in the diverse field of Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture. Knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected.

   The role as a Data scientist

   As Data engineer/developer you will work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects to create insights that solve business problems in all industries and for all business functions.

   In the day to day activities you are facing clients with business demands to be translated into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, engineering frameworks, data analysis and recommendations. These activities will be executed in a multi-disciplinary agile team and will lead to implementation and production.

   Furthermore, we expect leadership capabilities to lead less experienced colleagues in their work.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is for a 'Data Engineer' and focuses heavily on understanding business needs, translating them into technical requirements, and working with consultants, engineers, and architects. While it mentions diverse data projects like NLP, time series modeling, and image recognition, it does not specify the development or fine-tuning of generative models, LLMs, or diffusion models, nor does it detail the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer such as prompt engineering, RAG systems, or PEFT. The role appears to be more aligned with traditional data engineering and consulting, with a focus on leveraging existing data for business insights rather than developing cutting-edge generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes working closely with clients, translating business demands into solutions, and understanding business problems across industries.
The role involves understanding client needs and aligning technical solutions with business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: create insights that solve business problems

job_tasks.justification: The job title is 'Data Engineer' and the description mentions working on diverse data architect projects.
The role involves data engineering activities and working with data science and consultancy.
job_tasks.phrase: Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions working with fields such as natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition, which involve modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition

job_tasks.justification: The role involves translating business demands into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, and engineering frameworks, implying software development aspects.
The description mentions implementation and production, which are part of the software development lifecycle.
The mention of 'production' suggests involvement in deploying and maintaining solutions, which aligns with operations engineering.

work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects
Knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected.
create insights that solve business problems
